findings.title: Consider following the Solidity style guide
findings.description: Formatting of the code should be adjusted for maximum readability by making sure you follow the solidity style guide rules.

findings.title: Consider counting previous stake towards minStake when adding funds to a request
findings.description: If a user has already staked in a request and desires to increase it, she currently needs to increment at least minStake even though that mark was already achieved.

findings.title: Consider using external for function visibility
findings.description: Using external function visibility can help save gas especially when functions have multiple arrays as arguments and are only accessed from outside.
